author: ramankhurana
body:
This PR add a boolean switch to make sure that code don't crash on AOD in the absence of RECO dataset. By default the code will still run on the RECO. This is mainly useful when JME want to run the s/w locally on AOD.

Automatically ported from CMSSW_8_1_X #16153 (original by @ramankhurana).
title: From cmssw 8 0 11 reco switch
